statements: SELECT * FROM student_progress
SELECT student_id, grade FROM student_progress WHERE progress_perc > 80
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE student_id = 3
SELECT grade, progress_perc FROM student_progress WHERE grade = 'A'
SELECT performance_analytics FROM student_progress ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE student_id = 1001;
SELECT student_id, grade, progress_perc FROM student_progress WHERE grade = 'A' ORDER BY progress_perc DESC;
SELECT student_id, performance_analytics FROM student_progress WHERE progress_perc > 80;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE grade IN ('A', 'B', 'C') AND progress_perc < 70 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, grade, progress_perc, performance_analytics FROM student_progress WHERE progress_perc BETWEEN 60 AND 90;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students WHERE progress > 75;
SELECT student_id, student_name, progress FROM students ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT student_name, assignment_score, exam_score FROM students JOIN performance_analytics ON students.student_id = performance_analytics.student_id;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC, progress ASC
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade FROM students WHERE progress > 50
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade FROM students WHERE grade = 'A' OR grade = 'B'
SELECT student_name, progress FROM students LEFT JOIN performance_analytics ON students.student_id = performance_analytics.student_id
SELECT student_name, quiz_score, assignment_score, exam_score FROM students JOIN performance_analytics ON students.student_id = performance_analytics.student_id WHERE quiz_score > 80
SELECT student_id, course_id, progress FROM student_progress;
SELECT course_id, progress, student_id FROM student_progress;
SELECT grade, grade_id, student_id FROM grades;
SELECT course_id, grade, student_id FROM grades;
SELECT student_id, avg_score, course_id FROM performance_analytics;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE progress >= 0.5 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, AVG(progress) as avg_progress FROM student_progress GROUP BY student_id, course_id HAVING avg_progress > 0.7;
SELECT MAX(progress) as max_progress, MIN(progress) as min_progress FROM student_progress WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) as avg_grade FROM grades GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY avg_grade DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, completion_rate, avg_score FROM performance_analytics WHERE avg_score >= 80 AND completion_rate < 1;
SELECT * FROM student_progress;
SELECT student_id, course_id, progress FROM student_progress WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM performance_analytics WHERE correct_attempts > 5 ORDER BY total_attempts DESC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(course_id) AS total_courses FROM grades GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY student_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT course_name, total_attempts, correct_attempts FROM performance_analytics WHERE course_id = 101 AND total_attempts >= 10 ORDER BY correct_attempts DESC, total_attempts ASC;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM grades WHERE course_id = 203 AND grade IN ('A', 'B') ORDER BY student_id, grade DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM courses WHERE course_id BETWEEN 200 AND 300 ORDER BY course_name ASC;

SELECT student_id, progress, course_id FROM student_progress sp JOIN performance_analytics pa ON sp.student_id = pa.student_id WHERE pa.total_attempts > 50 AND progress < 100 ORDER BY progress ASC, total_attempts DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 80;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM grades WHERE subject = 'Math';
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE course_name LIKE '%Science%';
SELECT student_id, session_date, time_spent_min FROM performance_analytics WHERE time_spent_min < 30 ORDER BY session_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 70 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, topic, progress_percentage FROM student_progress WHERE topic LIKE 'Math%' ORDER BY progress_percentage ASC;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe' ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, MAX(time_spent_min) AS max_time_spent FROM performance_analytics GROUP BY student_id HAVING max_time_spent >= 120;
